channel.title: CVE Feed for Metagauss -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Metagauss -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-6411|2024-08-01T21:41:03.291Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.9. This is due to a lack of validation on user-supplied data in the 'pm_upload_image' AJAX action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update their user capabilities to Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-6410|2024-08-01T21:41:03.305Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.9 via the 'pm_upload_image' function due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to change the profile picture of any user.

item.title: CVE-2024-5453|2024-08-01T21:11:12.785Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the pm_dismissible_notice and pm_wizard_update_group_icon functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.6. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to change arbitrary options to the value '1' or change group icons.

item.title: CVE-2024-2951|2024-08-01T19:32:42.520Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-30491|2024-08-01T15:59:32.645Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2023-33321|2024-07-25T14:06:14.937Z -- metagauss -- eventprime
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss EventPrime allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects EventPrime: from n/a through 2.8.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-6411|2024-07-10T20:09:59.818Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.9. This is due to a lack of validation on user-supplied data in the 'pm_upload_image' AJAX action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update their user capabilities to Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-6411|2024-07-10T04:31:30.117Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.9. This is due to a lack of validation on user-supplied data in the 'pm_upload_image' AJAX action. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to update their user capabilities to Administrator.

item.title: CVE-2024-6410|2024-07-10T04:31:30.743Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.9 via the 'pm_upload_image' function due to missing validation on a user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to change the profile picture of any user.

item.title: CVE-2023-52117|2024-06-12T13:40:09.860Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid: from n/a through 5.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-23989|2024-06-04T17:22:31.538Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.1.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-23976|2024-06-05T19:27:31.674Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Incorrect Default Permissions vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.1.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2023-33321|2024-05-17T06:45:48.669Z -- metagauss -- eventprime
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss EventPrime allows Exploiting Incorrectly Configured Access Control Security Levels.This issue affects EventPrime: from n/a through 2.8.6.

item.title: CVE-2023-51543|2024-06-04T17:20:28.155Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Authentication Bypass by Spoofing vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic allows Accessing Functionality Not Properly Constrained by ACLs.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-51544|2024-06-04T17:20:23.881Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Improper Control of Interaction Frequency vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic allows Functionality Misuse.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.0.

item.title: CVE-2024-5453|2024-06-06T18:24:45.363Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the pm_dismissible_notice and pm_wizard_update_group_icon functions in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.6. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with Subscriber-level access and above, to change arbitrary options to the value '1' or change group icons.

item.title: CVE-2024-1126|2024-03-13T15:27:16.554Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the get_attendees_email_by_event_id() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to to retrieve the attendees list for any event.

item.title: CVE-2024-1127|2024-06-04T18:01:15.367Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized access of data due to a missing capability check on the booking_export_all() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to retrieve all event booking which can contain PII.

item.title: CVE-2024-1321|2024-03-13T15:26:56.986Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to payment bypass in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.2. This is due to the plugin allowing unauthenticated users to update the status of order payments. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to book events for free.

item.title: CVE-2024-1320|2024-06-04T18:00:35.507Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Stored Cross-Site Scripting via the 'offline_status' parameter in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.3 due to insufficient input sanitization and output escaping. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts in pages that will execute whenever a user accesses an injected page.

item.title: CVE-2024-1991|2024-04-09T18:58:59.144Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20payment%2C%20and%20user%20login
item.description: The RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to privilege escalation due to a missing capability check on the update_users_role() function in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.0.0. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to escalate their privileges to that of an administrator

item.title: CVE-2024-1990|2024-04-09T18:58:52.047Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20payment%2C%20and%20user%20login
item.description: The RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to blind SQL Injection via the ‘id’ parameter of the RM_Form shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.1.0 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.

item.title: CVE-2024-1123|2024-06-04T17:59:56.017Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized modification of data due to a missing capability check on the save_frontend_event_submission() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.2. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to overwrite the title and content of arbitrary posts. This can also be exploited by unauthenticated attackers when the allow_submission_by_anonymous_user setting is enabled.

item.title: CVE-2024-1124|2024-06-04T17:59:40.679Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized email sending due to a missing capability check on the ep_send_attendees_email() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to send arbitrary emails with arbitrary content from the site.

item.title: CVE-2024-1125|2024-06-04T17:59:35.284Z -- metagauss -- eventprime%20%E2%80%93%20events%20calendar%2C%20bookings%20and%20tickets
item.description: The EventPrime – Events Calendar, Bookings and Tickets plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized loss of data due to a missing capability check on the calendar_events_delete() function in all versions up to, and including, 3.4.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to delete arbitrary posts.

item.title: CVE-2024-29776|2024-06-04T17:57:50.152Z -- metagauss -- eventprime
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Metagauss EventPrime.This issue affects EventPrime: from n/a through 3.3.9.

item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.9.

item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.7.9.

item.description: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid allows Removing Important Client Functionality.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.8.2.

item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.7.2.

item.description: Authorization Bypass Through User-Controlled Key vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.7.6.

item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss EventPrime.This issue affects EventPrime: from n/a through 3.3.4.

item.title: CVE-2024-31362|2024-04-12T12:22:27.390Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid : from n/a through 5.7.8.

item.title: CVE-2024-25935|2024-03-21T17:31:23.173Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-3606|2024-06-04T17:31:44.505Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid%20%E2%80%93%20user%20profiles%2C%20memberships%2C%20groups%20and%20communities
item.description: The ProfileGrid – User Profiles, Memberships, Groups and Communities plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized deletion of data due to a missing capability check on the pm_upload_cover_image function in all versions up to, and including, 5.8.3. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber access or higher, to delete attachments.

item.title: CVE-2024-2951|2024-03-26T18:03:41.675Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.3.0.0.

item.title: CVE-2023-52117|2024-06-12T08:44:06.317Z -- metagauss -- profilegrid
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss ProfileGrid.This issue affects ProfileGrid: from n/a through 5.6.6.

item.title: CVE-2024-25935|2024-06-26T16:05:13.505Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic
item.description: Missing Authorization vulnerability in Metagauss RegistrationMagic.This issue affects RegistrationMagic: from n/a through 5.2.5.9.

item.title: CVE-2024-1990|2024-07-08T15:24:59.762Z -- metagauss -- registrationmagic%20%E2%80%93%20custom%20registration%20forms%2C%20user%20registration%2C%20payment%2C%20and%20user%20login
item.description: The RegistrationMagic – Custom Registration Forms, User Registration, Payment, and User Login plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to blind SQL Injection via the ‘id’ parameter of the RM_Form shortcode in all versions up to, and including, 5.3.1.0 due to insufficient escaping on the user supplied parameter and lack of sufficient preparation on the existing SQL query. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with contributor-level access and above, to append additional SQL queries into already existing queries that can be used to extract sensitive information from the database.
